definition: having a sharp narrow back, any of several baleen whales of the family Balaenopteridae having longitudinal grooves on the throat and a small pointed dorsal fin
details:
adjective
- having a sharp narrow back
= synonyms: razor-backed
noun
- any of several baleen whales of the family Balaenopteridae having longitudinal grooves on the throat and a small pointed dorsal fin
= synonyms: rorqual
- a mongrel hog with a thin body and long legs and a ridged back
= synonyms: razorback hog
